channel.title: Theiving stalls help
channel.description: HEy guys. I would like to know if there would be a way to change the time it takes to theiv each stall. any ideas? im using PI.

item.title: Theiving stalls help
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Not sure how PI handles ticks, but I’m sure it would be something like… client.thieveTimer = 5; or c.theiveTimer = 5;
That would mean it would take 3 seconds between each action.

Read full topic

item.title: Theiving stalls help
item.dc:creator: @Jake2008 Jake2008
item.description:
@Jake2008 wrote:

Ive never done this so this is a guess.
(assuming this is a PI source)
go to actionhandler.java and find the ID for the stall search for that and it will be in a switch statement
then just edit the code there for each stall, it will have a timer in miliseconds or the timer may be a variable which you will have to edit somwere else, best of luck.

add msn if u need more help

Read full topic
